Package com.facebook.stats.mx

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    StatsCollector  
    StatsReader  
    StatType
    String wrapper that can memoize and efficiently do prepend/append/INSERT For use with counters that need a default and a dynamic one (ex: per- category)
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    JVMStatsExporter
    Exports JVM stats so that they are available as counter values in fb303 stats.
    Stats  
    StatsUtil
    Helper methods for converting stat objects into key/value pairs that conform to standing naming conventions around .
    TemplateStatType
    efficient implementation where you want a default key and a base key

    example:

    We want getKey() to return "scribe.all_cat.network_store.sent.bytes" but want to be able to efficient create per-category value: "scribe.per_cat.category.network_store.sent.bytes"

    We don't want to prepend "scribe.all_cat" every time we need this default so we memoize a default key, but store the prefix/suffix for the per-category key.
